synopsis.text:
All was peaceful on Earth and Soukaizan after Wataru's triumph over Doakudar, allowing him to enjoy blissful days with his friends. However, the tranquility is disrupted when Ryujinmaru makes an appearance, seeking Wataru's aid once more. Doakudar's brother, Dowaruda, has seized control of Mt. Seikai, the source of the radiant rainbow that graces Mt. Soukai. If the stars mountains lose their luster, the rainbow will vanish, plunging everyone into an abyss of everlasting darkness.

To prevent this catastrophe, Wataru embarks on a new journey, traversing the seven mountains of Mt. Sekai to confront this formidable adversary. The fate of Soukaizan hangs in the balance as Wataru races against time, hurtling through space to reach the mountain and vanquish the enemy. Can he rise to the challenge and save the world from the clutches of darkness once again?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
